panel.name: login.pnl

description.html:p: The standard PVSS login panel, customized for use with the JCOP Framework.

html:ul.html:li: Type in your login name in the "User Name" field and press ENTER
Type in your password in the "Password" field and press ENTER

instruction.html:p: If the username or password is incorrect, you will be informed by an error message.
If you forgot your password or cannot log in, please contact your user administrator.
Note! If your password is empty you will be asked to change your password upon login.

panel.instruction: Copy the file (in the BMP format) containing the logo to pictures/logo.bmp . This will alter the logo used by the login panel and the panel.
panel.restriction: If the login is unsuccesfull, the previous user is not logged-out automatically. One needs to use the option available in the context menu brought by the button (embedded on many panels) to perform a log out from the UI.
